xml.xml: 1-TAP anywhere to JUMP 2-TAP and HOLD to JUMP HIGHER
When in the AIR you can TAP and HOLD to GLIDE slowly to the ground
Jump on enemies' heads to knock'em out.
Avoid spikes, plants and TNT barrels if you want to live!
Want to keep playing? Spend one of your bananas to continue running.
No bananas left? Shop is the right place for you!
Bobo's not handsome enough? You can style him up in the Customize section.
Don't miss Tips and Tricks in the Loading Screen, they can be useful.
You can earn some extra coins by inviting your facebook friends to play.
Land on a mushroom for an extra boost!
SWIPE DOWN at great heights to perform a deadly super drop!
Play bonus levels to earn great rewards!
Short of coins? Try out FREE COINS section.
Bananas are very rare, try not to miss them!
Use Double Coins power-up to get double coins on level.
With Coins Magnet power-up you can collect nearby coins, but it won't last forever.
Shield power-up can protect you from any enemy, but only once!
Keep an eye on the number of stars on each island.
Watch out for this fellow! His boomerang is dangerous.
Spear gorillas belong to elite squad of gorilla soldiers but you can still smack them on their big head.
Piranha plant. Steady. Hungry. Dangerous.
Visit leaderboard to see your and your friends' standings.
Share your adventures and brag to your friends.
